item.title: Foundation Image
item.description: Purpose This is my notes on creating foundation image and how I failed. I found a workaround instead. I will come back to this later on for the sake of learning more about Linux boot process. Building Foundation AMI apt-get update && apt-get install -y python python-pip python3 python3-pip Create the volume # aws ec2 create-volume --size 8 --volume-type standard --region us-east-1 --availability-zone us-east-1a --tag-specifications 'ResourceType=volume,Tags=[{Key=Name,Value=foundation-vol}]' { "AvailabilityZone": "us-east-1a", "Tags": [ { "Value": "foundation-vol", "Key": "Name" } ], "Encrypted": false, "VolumeType": "gp2", "VolumeId": "vol-057fc42f851326e6b", "State": "creating", "Iops": 100, "SnapshotId": "", "CreateTime": "2019-04-18T15:49:25.
